channel.title: Recent & Upcoming Talks on μβ
channel.description: Recent content in Recent & Upcoming Talks on μβ

item.title: Intro to package development in Julia
item.description: A quick introduction to the why and how of package development in Julia for scientific computing, with two applications of custom arrays. One of them, MatFuncs.jl was live-coded and available here.

item.title: Golang in a multi-project, multi-platform team
item.description: This talk (in French) was part of a second meetup introducing Golang use cases to Lille tech community. The slides (in French) can be found here.
